text: SUMMARY Major surgery with the potential for: o Significant blood loss ° Haemodynamic instability o Postoperative respiratory compromise o And significant pain Anaesthetic technique can have a significant impact on: ° Intraoperative monitoring o Neurological outcomes o Blood loss o Severity of postoperative pain Majority of patients have idiopathic scoliosis, but it is important to recognise those patients with comorbidities which will impact significantly on anaesthetic management
